short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create images for social media and marketing material in seconds!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stencil lets you create your own images instantly, and features:

- Over 5,000,000 new royalty-free background photos (with search)
- Over 3,100,000 royalty-free icons (with search)
- 1,350+ all new templates
- 4,700+ fonts
- Instantly add captions to images on Facebook, Pinterest & Instagram and any images on the web!
- Custom watermark

Start creating and sharing your images with Stencil!
